locale.name: permission.quiqqer.users.delete_self
locale.en: Can delete his own user account

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.admin
locale.en: Is allowed to loged in to the backend (Administration)

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.system.update
locale.en: Is allowed to update the system.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.system.cache
locale.en: Is allowed to delete the cache.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.system.console
locale.en: Is allowed to loged in to the QUIQQER console

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.setconfig
locale.en: Is allowed to edit project settings.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.editCustomCSS
locale.en: Is allowed to edit Custom-CSS from a project.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.project.setconfig
locale.en: Is allowed to edit project settings.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.site.edit
locale.en: Is allowed to edit the site.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.site.del
locale.en: Is allowed to delete the site.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.site.new
locale.en: Is allowed to create children sites.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.sites.set_permissions
locale.en: Is allowed to set and edit permissions to sites.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.projects.sites.new
locale.en: Is allowed to create children sites.

locale.name: permission.quiqqer.editors.toolbar.delete
locale.en: Is allowed to delete editor toolbars.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.imageLibrary.auto
locale.en: QUIQQER determines which library is used.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.createCacheOnSave
locale.en: Create image cache on the fly.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.maxUploadFileSize
locale.en: Maximum file size of an image

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.mediaSettings.maxUploadFileSize.description
locale.en: Only images smaller than the specified value are allowed to be uploaded.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.convertRomanLetters.description
locale.en: Convert Roman characters into their Latin counterpart. Umlauts like ä ö ü thus become ae, oe and ue.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.defaultSitestructure.win.text
locale.en: Do you want to create a standard page structure for the project?

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.defaultSitestructure.win.information
locale.en: For the project standard pages are created, such as imprint, search, terms and conditions or privacy policy. This simplifies the start of your new page or project.

locale.name: mail.settings.verify_peer
locale.en: Requires verification of the SSL certificates.

locale.name: mail.settings.verify_peer_name
locale.en: Requires verification of the peer name.

locale.name: message.testmail.success
locale.en: Test Email successfuly send. You can find a detailed Log in mailtest.log or debug.log.

locale.name: log.out.message
locale.en: Please sign out before you close the administration. Otherwise, existing data will be lost. Would you still continue to proceed?

locale.name: message.set.new.password
locale.en: You must change your password. Please enter a new password.

locale.name: user.settings.setNewPassword.text
locale.en: At the next login, the user must set a new password.

locale.name: message.setup.is.currently.running
locale.en: The setup is running. Please wait until this is finish.

locale.name: message.packages.no.updates.available
locale.en: No updates were found. Your system is up to date.

locale.name: quiqqer.auth.description
locale.en: The standard QUIQQER authentication by username and password.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.global.desc
locale.en: Primary Authenticators are authentication methods which provide the user at the beginning of his Authentication. In addition, you can go over the permissions management for each group or user and set more factor authentication.

locale.name: exception.forwarding.not.found
locale.en: This forwarding could not be found.

locale.name: exception.config.save.not.allowed
locale.en: You do not have the necessary permissions to save the configuration

locale.name: exception.media.upload.fileSize.is.to.big
locale.en: The file is unfortunately too big. The maximum upload size for a file is [size]

locale.en: Please select a folder to move the files.

locale.en: The file [file] could not be moved

locale.name: exception.media.copy.is.no.folder
locale.en: Please select a folder to copy the files.

locale.name: exception.media.restore.is.no.folder
locale.en: Please select a folder to restore a folder.

locale.name: exception.media.upload.is.no.folder
locale.en: Please select a folder. You can only upload files to a folder.

locale.name: exception.media.upload.no.data
locale.en: No data was sent from files.

locale.name: exception.media.upload.max.filesize
locale.en: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize.

locale.name: exception.media.upload.max.form.filesize
locale.en: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE

locale.name: exception.media.upload.partially.uploaded
locale.en: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded.

locale.name: exception.media.upload.unsupported.archive
locale.en: An unsupported archive was uploaded. The archive couldn't extracted.

locale.name: exception.media.folder.name.invalid
locale.en: This name is invalid for a folder.

locale.name: exception.media.root.folder.rename
locale.en: The media root directory of a project cannot be renamed.

locale.name: exception.media.folder.with.same.name.exists
locale.en: A folder with the same name already exists.

locale.name: exception.media.folder.could.not.be.created
locale.en: The folder could not be created.

locale.en: All http request will be 301-redirected to https

locale.en: The Webserver which is used on your system

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.packagestore.url.description
locale.en: This site is shown in an iframe, when the user clicks "Install extensions" in the System administration.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.license.url.description
locale.en: Composer license server for all non-free packages

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.general.globals.lockserver.enabled.description
locale.en: The lockserver outsources the dependency solution to an external QUIQQER server. Read more

locale.name: exception.error
locale.en: An error has occurred. The administrator has been notified.

locale.name: panels.bookmarks.description
locale.en: Use bookmarks to help you quickly reach your frequently used functions.

locale.name: exception.unknown.error
locale.en: Unfortunately an error has occurred. Please try again later.

locale.name: exception.network.error
locale.en: Unfortunately a connection error occurred. Please try again later.

locale.name: exception.user.save.mail.exists
locale.en: The user could not be saved. The user's e-mail address is already being used by another user. Since e-mail login is activated, users cannot receive the same e-mail address.

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.showResetPasswordBackend.description
locale.en: Show "Forgot password" option for backend Login (requires module quiqqer/verification!)

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.showResetPasswordFrontend.description
locale.en: Show "Forgot password" option for frontend Login (requires module quiqqer/verification!)

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.forceNewPasswordOnReset.description
locale.en: Users who reset their password via the "Forgot password" function must change their password after the first login

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.passwordResetLinkValidTime
locale.en: Period of validity for "Forgot password" link

locale.name: quiqqer.settings.auth.passwordResetLinkValidTime.description
locale.en: Period of validity in minutes for the link to confirm password reset.

locale.name: projects.project.settings.panel.publisher.description
locale.en: Default setting for the Publisher property. The Publisher is required for some editorial texts. As for example for blogs or news entries.

locale.name: exception.delete.originalfile.notfound
locale.en: The File could not be found. The file is completely deleted for this reason.

locale.name: exception.delete.root.file
locale.en: You cannot delete the root file.

locale.name: exception.custom.css.is.not.writeable
locale.en: The Custom CSS [file] is not writable. Please change the write permission.

locale.name: message.online.update.RAM.not.enough
locale.en:
There is not enough memory available for the online update. Please run the update in the CLI / Bash with the following command:
[command]

locale.name: message.online.update.RAM.insufficient
locale.en: Composer does not have enough memory available for this action. Please increase the memory limit for PHP or execute Composer in the command line

locale.name: message.online.update.RAM.insufficient.vcs
locale.en: PHP does not have enough memory available to perform this action, while a VCS updateserver is enabled

locale.name: message.online.update.RAM.insufficient.vcs.lock
locale.en: It is not possible to use the Lockserver, while a VCS updateserver is active and the system does not have enough memory available to peform this operation locally.

locale.name: exception.console.execute.only.in.cli
locale.en: System tools can only be run in the CLI.

locale.name: console.systemtool.clear-all
locale.en: Clears all variable data (cache, temp, sessions, lock)

locale.name: console.tool.project.rename.description
locale.en: Changes the name of an existing project.

locale.name: message.config.saved
locale.en: The configuration has been saved successfully.

locale.name: console.tool.permissions.list.description
locale.en: Displays a complete list of all permissions.

locale.name: console.tool.permissions.user.description
locale.en: Displays all permissions or a specific permission of a user. Additionally with --permission=[permission] only a specific permission can be displayed.

locale.name: console.tool.permissions.group.description
locale.en: Displays all permissions or a specific permission of a group. Additionally with --permission=[permission] only a specific permission can be displayed.

locale.name: exception.config.save.file.not.found
locale.en: Could not save the data. the config file [file] was not found.

locale.name: message.config.webserver.changed
locale.en: If your system operates on NGINX, you need to reapply the generated configuration.

locale.name: exception.lib.user.nobody.get.address
locale.en: The user Nobody can not have an address.

locale.name: exception.lib.user.address.not.found
locale.en: Could not find the address [addressId] for the user [userId].

locale.name: console.tool.passwordreset.warning
locale.en: ATTENTION! This tool will ireversibly reset the password of a user!

locale.name: console.tool.passwordreset.prompt.confirm
locale.en: Are you sure you want to reset the password of the user '[username]'? (y/n)

locale.name: console.tool.passwordreset.prompt.confirm2
locale.en: Are you really sure? This change can not be undone! (y/n)

locale.name: console.tool.passwordreset.user.not.found
locale.en: The given user was not found

locale.name: console.tool.passwordreset.success
locale.en: The password has been changed successfully. The new password is '[password]'

locale.name: exception.zip.extension.not.installed
locale.en: The action can not be performed. The ZIP extension of PHP is not installed on the system.

locale.name: exception.zip.folder.is.empty
locale.en: A ZIP file can not be created because the folder is empty

locale.name: exception.image.upload.image.corrupted
locale.en: The image contains corrupted data.Unfortunately, the upload was not successful. For more error information, please look at the error.log.

locale.en: The name has been cleared automatically:

locale.name: console.tool.project.rename.prompt.continue.new.name
locale.en: Do you want to continue with the cleared name? (y/n)

locale.name: console.tool.project.rename.finished.success
locale.en: The project has been renamed successfully

locale.en: Deleting a project can not be undone!

locale.en: The selected project was not found.

locale.name: console.tool.project.delete.prompt.warning.confirm
locale.en: Are you really sure that the project should be deleted? Please confirm by entering the projects name again:

locale.en: The confirmation did not match. Aborting!

locale.name: exception.site.panel.error
locale.en: Site panel with page ID #[id] could not be loaded.The panel was closed again

locale.name: panel.site.restore.message.local.newer
locale.en:
Restoring the page
#[id] - [title]

Changes have been found on your PC that have not yet been saved online.

The local changes are from the [localeDate].


The online page was last updated on [editDate] from [editUser] ([editUsername]).

locale.name: panel.site.restore.message.online.newer
locale.en:
Restoring the page
#[id] - [title]

Changes have been found on your PC that have not yet been saved online.

The local changes are from the [localeDate].


The online page was last updated on [editDate] from [editUser] ([editUsername]).

Attention:

The online version of the site is newer than the local (not yet saved) version. If you accept the local data, the newer online version will be overwritten when you save the page.

Wenn Sie sich unsicher sind verwerfen Sie die lokalen Änderungen.

locale.name: message.maintenance
locale.en:
Maintenance work is currently underway.
Under certain circumstances, the system can only be used to a limited extent.
Please contact your administrator.

locale.name: control.date.missing.package
locale.en: The calendar package could not be found. Please install quiqqer/calendar

locale.name: control.icons.confirm.noResultsInfo
locale.en: There are no icons that match the search query

locale.en: You changed the title of the page. Do you want to change the URL?

locale.name: window.title.url.customization.information
locale.en: You have changed the title of the page and the URL differs from the title. Should the URL be adapted to the title?
